title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: The New Package Wizard in the Java Project is displaying a confusing message.
OB: When creating a new package in the Java Project, the user is presented with a message that is difficult to understand.
EB: The New Package Wizard should display a clear and concise message that guides the user in creating a new package.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Open the New Package Wizard.
